verses.roman:
ataeva tumi saba raha nīlācale
dina kata āmi tīrtha bhramiba ekale"

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; tumi—you; saba—all; raha—remain; nīlācale—at Jagannātha Purī; dina—days; kata—some; āmi—I; tīrtha—the sacred places of pilgrimage; bhramiba—I shall tour; ekale—alone.
translation: "You should all therefore remain here in Nīlācala for some days while I tour the sacred places of pilgrimage alone."
